text: Q3. | Consider the following ER Diagram Shown below: employee-name worker Which of the following possible relations will hold if the above ERD is mapped into relation models which always satisfy 3NF? 1. employee (employee-id, employee-name, telephone-number, manger-id) 2. employee (employee-id, employee-name, telephone-number) 3. works-for (employee-id, manger-id) (a) 1 only (b) 2 only (c) 2 and 3 only (d) Either a or Â¢
